articles.title: Sleep's First Half Crucial for Brain Reset - Neuroscience News
articles.description: During the first half of sleep, the brain actively weakens the synaptic connections formed during wakefulness, supporting the Synaptic Homeostasis Hypothesis on the purpose of sleep.

articles.title: Loneliness Peaks in Youth and Old Age - Neuroscience News
